summary: Increased health for all (most) non-playable races.
descriptionHtml:
All races, non-playable, have increased health, around 50 percent or so.

The included readme show all before and after values but here are some examples:
Frostbite Spider - 15 - 30
Frostbite Spider Giant - 250 - 320
Frostbite Spider Large - 100 - 150
Giant - 250 - 350
Hagraven - 300 - 450
Horker - 150 - 200
Mammoth - 500 - 800


Other mods by Me:
